Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Brendan Muckian-Bates Posters on the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike
Muckian-Bates, Brendan
Muckian-Bates, Brendan
WAG.358
.25 linear feet in 1 flat-file folder
2018 Brendan Muckian-Bates is a social studies teacher in West Virginia and an organizer with the West Virginia Education Association (WVEA) and Industrial Workers of the World. Muckian-Bates was an active participant in the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike, and wrote about his experiences in Jacobin and the Socialist Worker. This collection consists of posters collected by Brendan Muckian-Bates from the strikes. Posters contain messages of general support for the teachers, as well as specific demands concerning salary and health insurance.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of posters collected by Brendan Muckian-Bates from the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike. Posters contain messages of general support for the teachers, as well as specific demands concerning salary and health insurance.
Biographical Note
Brendan Muckian-Bates is a social studies teacher in West Virginia and an organizer with the West Virginia Education Association (WVEA) and Industrial Workers of the World. He served as the PAC President of Monongalia County and as a delegate to the WVEA Delegate Assembly. Muckian-Bates was an active participant in the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike, and wrote about his experiences in Jacobin and the Socialist Worker.
Source: "Brendan Muckian-Bates," Keep Left Speakers, accessed April 15, 2019, http://keepleft.info/speaker/brendan-muckian-bates/.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Brendan Muckian-Bates, the creator of this collection, were relinquished and transferred to the public domain in 2018 by the donor. These materials are governed by a Creative Commons CC0 license, which permits publication and reproduction of materials accompanied by full attribution. See, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Brendan Muckian-Bates in July 2018; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.053.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Brendan Muckian-Bates Posters on the 2018 West Virginia Teachers' Strike; WAG 358; box number; folder number or item identifier; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning materials were described on the collection-level. Posters were flattened and rehoused by conservators.
